content: the tote bag is a quick easy and modern crochet bag this pattern is crocheted in one entire piece even the straps are crocheted directly onto the body so there is no need for seaming and you only fasten_off once right at the end this pattern creates a strong and versatile crochet tote that s perfect for summer groceries famers markets or beach days size one size skill level easy this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
